Author: hotforkingmess
Text: I’m terrible at reading replies, but I am right there with you. My mom does the same thing.  Ugh.

Author: SieBanhus
Text: This is why I hate when people buy e clothes for holidays. My sister EVERY year gets me a shirt or jacket of some sort in a size significantly larger than what I wear, and I’m always positively swimming in them, but it always makes me feel like complete shit. And people just do not get it. I’m sorry you had to deal with that :(
